articles.content:
[meta]: title (Second Post)
[meta]: author (Peter Grajcar)
[meta]: description (The second testing blog post.)

Inline code example `int`. Code block example:

```python
def f(x, y):
    return x*x + y*y

x, y = 69, 420
print(f(x, y))
print(x >= y)
```

```txt
> test
```

<del>Test</del>
